movie.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
movie.writer: Gary Scott Thompson (characters), Michael Brandt (story), Derek Haas (story), Gary Scott Thompson (story), Michael Brandt (screenplay), Derek Haas (screenplay)
movie.actors: Paul Walker, Tyrese Gibson, Eva Mendes, Cole Hauser
movie.plot: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.
